segments.text: Looking around this kitchen, I can't help but feel a growing sense of distaste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just everywhere, pouring over the cabinet fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking into the wood, undoubtedly causing damage that will be costly to repair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is a slippery mess, creating a hazardous environment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an unpleasant thought, thinking about the potential for mold and mildew later on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a waste of water, just endlessly running down the drain and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the spreading puddle makes me cringe a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This lack of basic household attention is quite frankly repulsive to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a scene of unnecessary decay and impending ruin for the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the warped wood, the ruined finish on the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone will have a very difficult time cleaning this up, and it could have been avoided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer sloppiness of the situation is quite off-putting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to turn off that faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess really rubs me the wrong way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an avoidable disaster in the making.
segments.speaker: PAR
